*div1 type="summary"* *p*Roster of a detachment of militia, May 18, 1826*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Register for a detachment of the *person_mentioned*Malitia */person_mentioned*of *person_mentioned*Col° Austin*/person_mentioned*s Battalion under the Command of*person_mentioned* Capt. A. C. Buckner*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="05-18-1826">May 18th 1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Name of Officers Comdg. Comps. *person_mentioned*captains */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*lieut */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Sergants */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Corporals */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Priat */person_mentioned*Total Aggrt. *date_mentioned n="05-23-1826">May 23,1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
